name: Unbilled Proceduressss
query:
SELECT 
    S.name AS "SN:Link/Sales Order:100",
    S.transaction_date AS "Date:Date:100", 
    S.patient AS "Patient:Data:100", 
    S.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:220", 
    P.mobile_no AS "Mobile No:Data:120",  
    S.ref_practitioner AS "Doctor:Data:200", 
    S.medical_department AS "Medical Department:Data:200", 
    I.item_code AS "Service Name:Data:250", 
    SI.item_code AS "Service Name In invoice:Data:250", 
    I.item_group AS "Service Type:Data:120",

    CASE 
        WHEN I.delivered_qty = 1 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN I.delivered_qty = 0 THEN 'To Deliver and Bill'
        ELSE S.status
    END AS "Status:Data:120",

    I.qty AS "Qty", 
    SUM(ANS.amount) AS "Anischarge:Currency:120",
    ROUND(R.rate, 2) AS "Rate:Currency:100"
FROM 
    `tabSales Order` S
JOIN 
    `tabSales Order Item` I ON S.name = I.parent
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` SI ON SI.so_detail = I.name
JOIN 
    `tabClinical Procedure Template` R ON I.item_code = R.name  
JOIN 
    `tabAneasthesia` ANS ON ANS.parent = R.name  
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabPatient` P ON S.patient = P.name
WHERE 
    S.docstatus = 1
    AND S.transaction_date BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s
GROUP BY 
    R.name
